ygData.subject: Re: Undocumented Everfrost Location
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless something has changed within the last week or so, the Gigantic Zweihander is carried by Karg Icebear. Munk ... From: avron@alliances.org
ygData.messageBody:
Unless something has changed within the last week or so, the Gigantic Zweihander is carried by Karg Icebear.

Munk

-----Original Message-----
From: avron@... [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 4:53 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Undocumented Everfrost Location



This cave is not completely undiscovered, I believe this is where you
find the giant zweihander, I think it is off that necro, you need a
group of high level 30's to pull it off too..

- Avron -


"Whitmore, Lance" wrote:

>
>
> If you head north where the river comes to the mountain, take a look
> thru the ice and you will see the cave. Sometimes you will see a
> goblin swimming at the mouth of the cave. The cave itself is inside
> the mountain, so as you swim it will eventauly open up above the
> surface of the water.
>
> I believe that the NPC Necro's con was aggressive and he was red at
> lvl 16. Be careful when approaching him. BTW there is very little
> light, and it is a maze ( oh what fun... hehe)
>
> I never zoned so i dont believe its a new zone, just undiscovered..
> the cave itself is quite large (or it seemed that way) but was
> relativly empty. This is what i saw:
>
> 1.. House with 4 icebone skeletons
> 2.. Shrine ( zone point )structure protected by 2 icebones skeletons
> 3.. Human NPC Necromancer with pet - red at lvl 16
> 4.. Possible Giant.. (type unknown) - I never saw one myself
>
> And, there could be more to the cave that went unexplored, because i
> had no way of passing the Necro at the time. I was informed of the
> cave by a fellow player. She stated that she had seen a giant, but
> alass i have not.
>
> Good Luck
>
